title: 3dmaskSVD
description: Computes the principal singular vector of the time series vectors extracted from the input dataset over the input mask

vnorm.title: Normalize time series flag
vnorm.description: L2 normalize all time series before SVD

sval.title: Singular vector output
sval.description: Output singular vectors 0 .. a (default a=0 = first one only)

mask_file.title: Mask file
mask_file.description: Define the mask (default is entire dataset)

polort.title: Polynomial trend removal order
polort.description: Remove polynomial trend (default 0 if not specified)

ort.title: Removing orthogonals time series
ort.description: Time series to remove from the data before SVD-ization. You can give more than 1 '-ort' option. 'xx.1D' can contain more than 1 column.

alt_input.title: Alternative input dataset
alt_input.description: Alternative way to give the input dataset name
